channel.title: Dylan Reed Hacking Audreyhacking Audrey Apple on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Dylan Reed Hacking Audreyhacking Audrey Apple on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Win Win Win Win
item.description: I got an email today from Ars Electronica notifying me that my website AudreyHacking.com has been accepted for entry in the Prix Ars Electronica 2002 competition. Whee. I hope I win. That would rule. In other news. I slept a lot last night. it was nice. however.. I slept so much that I overslept this morning. argh.I think that I am going to purchase an ibook on friday. I hope anyway.
